attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The clip on tie encourage laziness. If clip ties were banned, then it would force people to learn to tie a tie. It is therefore in the interest of public education for clip on ties to be banned. Besides this, the metal clip itself can be used in terrorist activity and by serial killers.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
